thread.title: France Economy: Growth Prospects Slow Amid Political Uncertainty
thread.title_full: France Economy: Growth Prospects Slow Amid Political Uncertainty

author: webmaster
title: France Economy: Growth Prospects Slow Amid Political Uncertainty
text:
The Bank of France cut its domestic growth outlook just days after President Emmanuel Macron named Francois Bayrou the country’s fourth prime minister in a year. The central bank cited the political upheaval as a drag on household and business confidence, saying it now expects only a 0.9% expansion in 2025 instead of 1.2% it predicted in September. Bloomberg’s Phil Serafino reports.
